1.1.4.name: wordpress/dailytube
1.1.4.description:
DEPRECATED: This plugin is deprecated and not maintained anymore. Its use is not recommended.

With this plugin you can embed videos from DailyMotion, YouTube and Google in your WordPress posts. Using it, you can change the size or aspect of all your videos in the settings page. All you need to post a video, is to know the video ID or the video URL, both are shown on the video page URL. For YouTube videos, you can configure all options: Colors, Related Videos, Genie Menu and Border Colors.

Video URL or content tags are provided to post a video:

To post a video, just write the video URL in a single line of your post, something like:

  • http://es.youtube.com/watch?v=fivlChihj4A
  • http://www.dailymotion.com/txanny/vid
